title: Mr Space Bullet
description: Mr Space Bullet is a 2D shooting game where you will be on a staircase in outer space. While trying to climb up, you will come across many aliens on your way. Your job is to aim at your enemies precisely at their heads. Shoot the alien you encounter on every stair without blinking an eye.

title: Dino Chaos Idle
description: Dino Chaos Idle is an idle clicker game where you give life to the dinosaurs. You will enable them to create chaos on the surface by resurrecting them. Many scientists will work with you while you are working underground. Each of the scientists has their own specific formula for the job.
